message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY 

This paper is about using the BERT model for the hyperpartisan news detection task. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language) which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. The paper also involves information retrieval (cs.IR) as it deals with identifying relevant articles for the task. Machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) are also relevant categories as the BERT model is a deep learning model. Finally, the paper involves cybersecurity (cs.CY) as it deals with detecting hyperpartisan news which can be used to manipulate public opinion.
